summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6701 for the improvement District No. 6701 for the improvement of Pike Street from 1st Avenue to 8th Avenue, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof upon the property within the district; establishing a local improvement fund, and amending Ordinance 108255 to revise the maximum interest payment on local improvement bonds.
